price: 61. ceux-là se hâtent vers les bonnes œuvres qu’ils accomplissent les premiers.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَٰبِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ulāika yusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūna
